AMG1L.VS.summary: AB Amber Grid operates as a natural gas transmission system company in the Republic of Lithuania. The company is involved in the transmission of natural gas through high pressure pipelines to system users. It also operates, maintains, and develops natural gas transmission system that includes gas transmission pipelines, gas compressor stations, gas metering and distribution stations, and cathodic protection installations, as well as data transmission and telecommunications systems. The company's natural gas transmission system consists of 2,115 km of gas transmission pipelines, 65 gas distribution stations, 3 gas metering stations, and 2 gas compressor stations. It serves companies operating in the sectors of electricity, district heating, and industry; and medium-sized local businesses, as well as natural gas suppliers receiving natural gas transmission services. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Vilnius, the Republic of Lithuania. AB Amber Grid is a subsidiary of UAB EPSO-G.
